Creates a button at position x, y, containing certain text

Reimplemented from CLabel.

int CToggleButton::setIndicatorColor ( PgColor_t indicatorColor )
 

The default fill color for the toggle button's indicator.

int CToggleButton::setIndicatorHeight ( int indicatorHeight )
 

The height of the indicator box. By default, the height and width are determined by the font size.

int CToggleButton::setIndicatorWidth ( int indicatorWidth )
 

The width of the indicator box. By default, the height and width are determined by the font size.

int CToggleButton::setIndicatorSize ( int indicatorWidth,
int indicatorHeight )
 

Sets the size of the indicator button

int CToggleButton::setIndicatorDepth ( int indictorDepth )
 

The border width of the indicator box. By default, the height and width are determined by the font size.

int CToggleButton::setTypeOneOfMany ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_ONE_OF_MANY - a diamond-shaped toggle indicator.

int CToggleButton::setTypeNOfMany ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_N_OF_MANY - a square-shaped toggle indicator.

int CToggleButton::setTypeRound ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_ROUND - a round-shaped toggle indicator.

int CToggleButton::setTypeRadio ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_RADIO - a radio-button-shaped toggle indicator.

int CToggleButton::setTypeTick ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_TICK - a square indicator with a tick mark in it.

int CToggleButton::setTypeCheck ( )
 

Determines how the indicator is drawn. Possible values: Pt_CHECK - a square indicator with an X in it.

int CToggleButton::setOnStateColor ( PgColor_t onStateColor )
 

The background color used when the button is set (pressed in).

int CToggleButton::setOnStateFill ( )
 

Indicates whether or not Pt_ARG_SET_COLOR will be used. Pt_TRUE - use the value of Pt_ARG_SET_COLOR.

int CToggleButton::setOnStateNoFill ( )
 

Indicates whether or not Pt_ARG_SET_COLOR will be used. Pt_FALSE - ignore the value of Pt_ARG_SET_COLOR.

int CToggleButton::setSpacing ( int spacing )
 

The distance in pixels between the toggle indicator and the text label.
